name: Virtual Sheep
description:
Virtual Sheep, the most loved virtual pet of our computer, is back!

Virtual Sheep is a funny little sheep always wandering on your screen. You can play with it or let it lives happily and if you throw it away it will bounce against the edges of your screen until it finally touches the ground.

To add More sheep or close Virtual Sheep simply click on its notification on Windows Tray Bar, enjoy!

Color : Azure
